project.name: corba-main
project.description: This is the Ant file that builds the GlassFish ORB.

param.name: pkg-prefixes
param.value: -pkgPrefix PortableInterceptor org.omg -pkgPrefix IOP org.omg -pkgPrefix Messaging org.omg

target.name: test-all
target.depends: clean-test-output, test-init, test-rmi-iiop, test-corba, test-pi, test-naming, test-hopper, test-mantis, test-perf

target.name: do-cobertura-test
target.depends: clean, build-no-enhance, instrument-cobertura, build-tests, test-all, report-cobertura
